content.rendered:
Welcome to the
Official ProperT Airdrop

Start Airdrop

Sign-up and get notified of the drop!

Made possible by

What is an Airdrop?

Join the ProperT Airdrop
and receive free tokens!

Airdrops are a popular way for new cryptocurrency projects to generate interest and reward early adopters. Simply sign up and complete easy tasks to receive tokens and experience the benefits of blockchain-powered investing. Don’t miss out on this opportunity!

Start Airdrop

Introducing the ProperT Token

The first
token-back rewards program

Buyers can purchase any good or service through ForumPay-supported merchants and businesses. ProperT holders will automatically get a 5% token-back reward on the purchase price. ProperT tokens function like any other currency and can be used to transact everyday goods and services; a critical differentiating factor in the crypto space!

*Tokens equal to 5% of purchases made with the Token are awarded subject to a weekly cap calculated at an annual rate of 10% of each year’s new release.

Start Airdrop

How can you join?

Follow the instructions

Get a crypto wallet

If you don´t have one, follow these instructions. We recommend you to use Trust Wallet or any ERC20 compatible digital wallet.

Share on social media

Let’s make ProperT Airdrop a global event by commenting on and sharing the official airdrop post on Instagram or Twitter.

Wait for the drop

We drop hundreds of tokens weekly, so stay tuned to receive yours soon!

Start Airdrop

Sign-up and get notified of the drop!

Utility

For buyers

ProperT is a solution that is native to crypto. It enables crypto-holders to convert their crypto-currency through the ProperT dashboard and make purchases in ForumPay-supported merchants and businesses. ProperT works like any other currency that can be used to buy goods, services or real estate, with the additional benefit of receiving a 5% token-back reward for every purchase made. ProperT is the first token-back reward program and has been designed in a way that user experience is easy, fast and secure.

For merchants

Offer a rewards program that rewards your customer with a 5% token-back for any purchase at no cost to you. Stand out among your competition and offer this unique reward to attract new customers.

· Over 400 million digital wallets looking to spend

· Crypto consumers spend x2 more than the average debit/credit card user

· The 5% token-back reward is applied at no cost to the merchants

Help make ProperT the next big thing in crypto!

Join the community
